title: Scott Peterson guilty
author: VD
content_html:
I don’t share Fox News’ fascination with murder trials, but assuming that the jury got it right – how would I know – I’m pleased that they found him guilty of the 2nd degree murder of Connor Peterson, his unborn son. (He was also found guilty of the 1st degree murder of his wife, Laci.)

If we are fortunate, this will one day be seen as an important step forward in recognizing that unborn children are human and duly possessed of life, liberty and property rights.
